TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.SelectedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示包含 控件中选定项的索引的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection that contains the indexes to the selected items in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将索引存储到 控件中的选定项。A stores the indexes to the selected items in a control. 存储在 中的索引是 中的索引位置。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the . 存储 控件中显示的所有项。The stores all items displayed in the control. 下表显示了一个示例，说明了 如何存储 的项，并在 的示例中显示了其选择状态。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the and shows their selection states in an example . |索引Index|ItemItem|ListView 中的选择状态Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未选定Unselected| |11|Item2Item2|选定Selected| |22|Item3Item3|未选定Unselected| |33|Tuple.item4Item4|选定Selected| |44|Tuple.item5Item5|选定Selected| 根据上表中的 示例，下表演示了 的显示方式。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中选定项的索引Index of selected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|----------------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 您可以使用此类的属性和方法来使用集合执行各种任务。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 利用 方法，您可以确定 中的索引位置是否为 中存储的索引之一。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道该项位于集合中，就可以使用 方法来确定索引在 中的位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、和 成员以及 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `ListView1` 的 对象和一个名为 `TextBox1` 的窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序中调用 `InitializeListView` 方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 此示例要求事件处理程序与 事件正确关联。This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定 中选定项的数目。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 然后，你可以在循环遍历集合的值时使用此值，并需要提供多个迭代来执行循环。You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 如果 的 属性设置为 `false`，则此属性返回值为0或1，具体取决于是否选择了某个项。If the property of the is set to `false`, this property returns a value of either 0 or 1 depending on whether an item is selected.
